description: Xiangling è la chef del Wanmin Restaurant di Liyue. È famosa per la sua abilità culinaria e per il suo compagno Guoba. Eccelle nel danno Pyro off-field tramite il suo Elemental Burst.

artifacts.name: Emblem of Severed Fate (2) + Crimson Witch of Flames (2)
Wanderer's Troupe (2) + Crimson Witch of Flames (2)

info: Xiangling è uno dei migliori sub-DPS Pyro del gioco. Il suo Elemental Burst Pyronado fornisce danno consistente off-field. Priorità a Energy Recharge per uptime costante del Burst.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Dough-Fu
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along her path.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Guoba Attack
skills.desc: Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire at enemies, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Guoba Attack
Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire at enemies, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

skills.name: Pyronado
skills.desc: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her.
skills.details_html:
Pyronado
Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path.

passive_talents.name: Crossfire
passive_talents.desc: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
passive_talents.desc: When Guoba Attack's effect ends, Guoba will leave a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Chef de Cuisine
passive_talents.desc: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.desc: Enemies hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.desc: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence sends the opponent flying and deals an additional 75% of ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

constellations.name: Deepfry
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Guoba Mad
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Condensed Pyronado
constellations.desc: For the entire duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.
